Package square

Square classes are used to defined the component of the game board.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Empty
    Class representing empty square of the game board An empty square is defined by this information : name : An empty square can have actions such as : interaction display informations
    Enemy
    Class representing enemy of the game board An enemy is defined by those informations : name : life level : attack strength : A enemy can have actions such as : interaction display informations takes a hit gives a hit
    Square
    Class representing square of the game board A square is defined by this information : name : A square can have actions such as : interaction display informations
    Surprise
    Class representing surprise of the game board An surprise is defined by those informations : name : A surprise can have actions such as : interaction display square informations get equipped with defense tool get equipped with attack tool

Package square Description

Square classes are used to defined the component of the game board. These classes contain several informations and interaction depending on the kind of square.
Version:
1.0
